skin_information.name: Enchanted Elves (based on Elves v2)
skin_information.author: Roman M. Yagodin
skin_information.description: Based on Elves GUI skin version 2.0 for PlaneShift 0.5, with some fixes and enchantements. Original creators Cherppow & Vengeance. Special thanks to Rizin, Lanarel, weltall, Xordan and LigH. And my special thanks to Bonifarzia.
